## Correlation

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv('data/body.csv')
```
```{r}
cor.test(data$ChestDepth, data$ElbowDia)
plot(data$ChestDepth, data$ElbowDia)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv('data/vik_table_9_2.csv')
cor.test(data$X1, data$Y)
plot(data$X1, data$Y)
```

```{r}
x <-runif(100)
y <-runif(100)
cor.test(x, y)
plot(x, y)
```
